column4: So, I need to change my password after getting it back from being stolen
Is it at all possible for me to change it if I don't know the current password?
I don't know what that means
boot into single user mode and run passwd
are you in single user mode?
in single user mode, you should be at a text screen with a "#" on the screen.  You can type ls, etc.
just type in passwdâ€¦it will prompt you for a new password
That would have been kind of scary if it was that easy
do you know your current password?
